com.cieolib.cieolib

Class Cieo

  • Object
    • Cieo

  • public class Cieo
extends Object
    This is the main class for setting up and executing your animation.
    Since:
    0.1
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Novikov Igor

    • Constructor Detail

      • Cieo

        public Cieo(Context context,
    String text,
    TextView target_text_view,
    int[] shoot_from,
    BulletListener bullet_listener,
    int main_animation,
    int[] main_animation_settings,
    int hit_animation,
    int[] hit_animation_settings,
    int target_animation,
    int[] target_animation_settings)
        This is the main constructor. It is not recommended to be used unless you have all the necessary parameters. Then you can just use it without reference: new Cieo(params...).FIRE();
        Parameters:
        context - Activity Context.
        text - The text that will be animated. Each character is a 'bullet'.
        target_text_view - The 'target' TextView.
        shoot_from - The 'origin' of fire. This is the x and y parameters on the screen.
        bullet_listener - This is the listener that will notify the various events of the animation, such as lastBulletHit(). You can catch the animation events in 3 ways:

        1. Your class can implement the BulletInterface. In that case, you will have to implement all the listeners' methods.

        2. You can create a class that will extend the abstract class BulletAdapter. Then you can override only the methods you require.

        3. Use Bullet listener class that is already extending BulletAdapter.

        main_animation - Main animation type. Use MainAnimation class. Default: WAVE3_MODERATE
        main_animation_settings - Pass null unless MainAnimation is custom.
        hit_animation - The type of animation that will occur on the 'bullet' after it reaches target. Use HitAnimation class. Default: HitAnimation.NONE
        hit_animation_settings - Pass null unless HitAnimation is custom.
        target_animation - The type of animation that will occur on the 'target' after last 'bullet' animation ends. Default: TargetAnimation.FLASH_FAST.
        target_animation_settings - Pass null unless TargetAnimation is custom.

      • Cieo

        public Cieo(Context context)
        The 'step-by-step' constructor. After creating a Cieo instance with this constructor, you must call the next methods before execution: loadMagazine() and setTargetAndArm()
        Parameters:
        context - Activity Context.

    • Method Detail

      • loadMagazine

        public void loadMagazine(String text,
                int[] shoot_from)

        This method will load the 'magazine' with the character 'bullets' from the provided text, and sets the starting position of all the bullets.

        Basically, you can set the starting position of each 'bullet' manually by calling the getBullts() method.

        Parameters:
        text - The text to be 'fired'.
        shoot_from - Start coordinates. null will result in default coordinates (0,0).

      • setTargetAndArm

        public void setTargetAndArm(TextView target_text_view)
        The final method to be called before FIRE(). If any other method is called after this one, you will have to re-arm - call this method again.
        Parameters:
        target_text_view - The 'target' TextView.

      • setBulletListener

        public void setBulletListener(BulletListener bullet_listener)
        Parameters:
        bullet_listener - This is the listener that will notify the various events of the animation, such as lastBulletHit()

      • getBullets

        public List<TextView> getBullets()
        Gets the 'bullets' list for manually changing settings such as color and start coordinates.
        Returns:
        List of 'bullets'.

      • setAnimation

        public void setAnimation(int main_animation,
                int[] main_animation_settings,
                int hit_animation,
                int[] hit_animation_settings,
                int target_animation,
                int[] target_animation_settings)
        Animation settings.
        Parameters:
        main_animation - Main animation type. Use MainAnimation class. Default: WAVE3_MODERATE
        main_animation_settings - Pass null unless MainAnimation is custom.
        hit_animation - The type of animation that will occur on the 'bullet' after it reaches target. Use HitAnimation class. Default: HitAnimation.NONE
        hit_animation_settings - Pass null unless HitAnimation is custom.
        target_animation - The type of animation that will occur on the 'target' after last 'bullet' animation ends. Default: TargetAnimation.FLASH_FAST.
        target_animation_settings - Pass null unless TargetAnimation is custom.

      • FIRE

        public void FIRE()
        Executes the animation. Can be executed only ONCE.
